note.p: Death: Queen's Gate Gardens, London (09 February 1892)

Career: Commissioned by Sir Robert Peel to report on the agricultural state of Ireland (1846); Speciall Commissioner of the Times to report on the affect of Free Trade on agriculture (1850); MP for Dartmouth (1857-1859); MP for Stirling (1859-1865); Director, Land Department of the Board of Agriculture (1859-1891); one of the Inclosure Commissioners for England and Wales
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc 1891-1892 vol 50 pp xiii-xiv
Notes: DNB gives birth date as June 1816
